content:
Hi all. I had a question regarding `BeaconBlocksByRoot` request. I have two use cases for this request in mind:
(1) requesting parent block by root(`block.parent_root`) for a orphan block received over gossip and
(2) requesting attested block by root(`attestation.data.beacon_block_root`) for an attestation received over gossip

If these two use cases make sense, my question is that these two kind of roots are of type `SigningRoot` however in `BeaconBlocksByRoot` we request roots by type `HashTreeRoot`.
Maybe I'm not aware of it but is there a way to convert root from one type to another?

author: arnetheduck
content: <@416196008687697920> right - the intent was that it should request by signing root, but this is not clear in the text - I'll make a patch
